==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|じゅん|び|ちゅう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
{{suffix|準備|中|t1=preparation|t2=in|lang=ja|sort=しゅんびちゅう'}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|じゅんびちゅう}}

# of a shop, the state of being [[closed]], that is, not open for business

====Antonyms====
* {{l|ja|営業中}}

====Usage notes====
This is often printed on signs hanging at the entrance of a shop or restaurant and is shown when the store is closed temporarily. The reverse says {{l|ja|営業中}}. These signs are the Japanese equivalent of the English signs saying (Come in we're) open/(Sorry we're) closed.
